page.title: 05ATTITUDES/RELIGION/INDUSTRY
page.content: {ATTITUDES} People drive too fast as the council will not pay for any road signs. The district council is hated by most people in the area. The housing estate is generally approved of. The bus service could be improved. Farmers did not have enough time to adjust to the milk quota from the European Community and the EC is the cause of inflation. Parents try to give their children what they did not have themselves when they were young. Farmers tend to be in favour of conservation of the countryside. {RELIGION 200 out of 1500 villagers are church members.The only religion is Christian. {INDUSTRY A curtain making shop in Danehill
